testcase.name: testGetStudentById

error.message: ### Error querying database. Cause: org.apache.ibatis.executor.ExecutorException: A query was run and no Result Maps were found for the Mapped Statement 'com.yc.mybatis.mapper.StudentMapper.getStudentById'. It's likely that neither a Result Type nor a Result Map was specified. ### The error may exist in mapper/StudentMapper.xml ### The error may involve com.yc.mybatis.mapper.StudentMapper.getStudentById ### The error occurred while handling results ### SQL: select * from student where id = ? ### Cause: org.apache.ibatis.executor.ExecutorException: A query was run and no Result Maps were found for the Mapped Statement 'com.yc.mybatis.mapper.StudentMapper.getStudentById'.
